Class MovingObject

java.lang.Object
  MovingObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Projectile, Scatter, Tank
public class MovingObject
extends java.lang.Object

A basic object that moves

Has an image, x and y position, and x and y velocities that can be affected by environmental forces, such as gravity

Author:
Erik Miller, Jay Sathe, Tristan Seroff, Christian Ciabatoni

fall

public void fall(Tanks tanksGame,
                 ImagePanel imagePanel,
                 int[] groundHeightArray)
Makes the tank fall when there is no ground below it

Parameters:
tanksGame - Allows fall() to update the image
imagePanel - Allows fall() to get the height of the image
groundHeightArray - Allows MovingObject to determine the height of the ground
